sense.name: an intention, a reason for someone's actions
sense.examples: There is no apparent motive for the murder. Sally doesn't trust Bob's motives for wanting to be on the committee. They acted with the best of motives.

sense.name: a recurrent artistic theme or pattern
sense.examples: The entire work grows organically from the opening horn motive. The motives of death and regeneration can be seen in all his murals. The tablecloth had a decorative motive of grape vines and flowers around its border.
